dct_description_sm: California as unidentified island with unusual pointed northern coast, and with Anian to north. No place names other than: America Meridionale, America Settentrionale, Anian, Cumberland, Gronelandia, Europa, Affrica, and Asia.
Phillip J. Pirages Catalog 19, Item 258. -- McMinnville, OR, 1991.

Issued in: Dialogo Intorno alla cagione della celebre Aurora Boreale vedutasi in Cielo nella notte susseguente alli 16. Dicembre dell' Anno 1737, F.III / by [G.M. Serantoni]. -- Lucca : Per Giuseppe Salani, e Vincenzo Giutini, 1740. [iv],88p.; 4 fig. : 25.3 cm.
Book presents scientific thought about the aurora borealis which occurred on 16 December 1737 as colloquy among three friends, Atlante, Branco, and Minerva.
